project.name: Project
project.projectDescription: Projects are the basic units for managing and organizing R&D activities, workflows, and various resources. They provide teams with a centralized way to plan, track, report, and accept work progress. The main benefits are as follows:
project.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete project 【{name}】?
project.adminHint: Only administrators, creators, and responsible persons can modify and delete projects.
project.manageAndOrganizeWorkDesc: By adding projects, teams can choose different project templates and divide work into multiple phases and subtasks to meet structured management requirements.
project.promoteTeamCollaborationDesc: Projects provide team members with a centralized management platform where all related resources, tasks, documents, and communications can be conducted, facilitating collaboration and communication.
project.trackAndReportProgressDesc: Through projects, teams can track the progress of each task in real-time, understand current work status and remaining workload, and generate various reports based on projects, such as resource statistics and efficiency analysis.
project.improveWorkTransparencyDesc: Provides rich visualization tools such as kanban boards and reports to help teams and management clearly understand project team members' progress and bottlenecks.
project.projectTeamInfoSharingDesc: All project-related information is centralized in one place, where team members and stakeholders can access it anytime, ensuring information visibility.
project.riskAndIssueManagementDesc: Helps teams identify and track potential risks and issues, develop corresponding response strategies, track and resolve encountered problems, ensuring smooth project progress.

addProjectStep.title: Add Project
addProjectStep.text: Establish a basic unit for managing and organizing development and testing activities. Provides teams with a centralized way to plan, track, report, and accept work progress.

planIterationAndTest.title: Plan Iteration and Test
planIterationAndTest.text: Clarify the responsible person, time, goals, acceptance criteria, etc. for development and testing activities. Help teams carry out activities in an organized manner, ensuring software product quality and reliability.

developAndTest.title: Develop and Test Activities
developAndTest.text: Carry out development and testing activities according to the plan. Continuously track and manage work tasks, defects, requirements, user stories, tests, and other work items in the project.

reportResults.title: Report Results
reportResults.text: Summarize all aspects of R&D activities, including project progress, efficiency analysis, data assets, test results, etc. Provide strong support for successful project delivery.

agile.features: Core Features: Scrum Framework Support • Incremental Delivery • User-Driven Requirements.
agile.scenarios: Applicable Scenarios: Agile development teams for rapid product iteration.

general.features: Core Features: Work Breakdown Structure • Progress Management • Resource Dependency Visualization.
general.scenarios: Applicable Scenarios: Traditional R&D teams for cross-departmental collaboration projects.

testing.features: Core Features: Test Plan Customization • Multi-type Testing • Defect Tracking Loop.
testing.scenarios: Applicable Scenarios: Quality assurance teams for specialized testing projects.

form.timePlanDescription: Time constraints help ensure projects are completed within agreed timeframes, which is crucial for meeting customer expectations and contractual obligations.
form.ownerDescription: By setting an owner for the project, responsibilities and rights can be clarified, better promoting project completion and progress control, such as: problem solving, progress advancement, team member collaboration, etc.
form.importExampleDescription: Import main business example data for quickly familiarizing with AngusTester business and feature demonstration.
form.membersDescription: Clarify the participants in the project, project members will automatically be assigned data permissions under the project, facilitating team collaboration.

module.title: Software Modules
module.aboutDescription: Software modules are used to define and organize relatively independent functional sets in software systems. Through modules, tasks and functional use cases can be divided, thereby improving maintainability.
module.noModules: You haven't added any modules yet, immediately
module.noModulesDescription: You haven't added any modules yet.
module.addModuleHint: Press Enter or lose focus to save adding module, double-click existing module to enter edit mode
module.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete module 【{name}】?

tag.title: Data Tags
tag.aboutDescription: Data tags can facilitate categorization of tasks, functional use cases, etc., improve search and management efficiency, and promote efficient team collaboration. Examples: boundary testing, business process testing, error handling, input validation, output validation, exception condition testing, security testing, compatibility testing, etc.
tag.addTagHint: Press Enter or lose focus to save adding tag, double-click existing tag to enter edit mode.
tag.noTags: You haven't added any tags yet, immediately
tag.noTagsDescription: You haven't added any tags yet.
tag.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete tag 【{name}】?
